title_: Pakistan Education Endowment Fund / NEST Scholarship Policy
description_:
Pakistan Education Endowment Fund (PEEF)/ NEST Scholarship Policy Global Institute of Medical & Health Sciences, Hyderabad is the partner Institute of PEEF for Nursing (Generic BS Nursing), Lady Health Visitor (LHV), Community Mid Wife (CMW) & Certified Nursing Assistant (CNA) Scholarship.

1. The GIMHS Institutional Scholarship Award Committee (ISAC) notified to the PEEF will assess the cases of PEEF Scholarship. The Committee will approve the cases and report will be submitted to the PEEF for grant / award of the scholarship for the current year.

Global Institute of Medical & Health Sciences, Hyderabad offer Merit Scholarship to the admitted students of the College.

1. The GIMHS Merit Scholarships is offered to the students who secure First, Second and Third Positions in the Institute in Semester Examinations conducted by LUMHS, Jamshoro.

2. The GIMHS Scholarship Committee will assess the cases of Merit Scholarship. The Committee will approve the cases and report will be submitted to the Principal of the College for grant / award of the scholarship for the current year.

3. The decision of the GIMHS Scholarship Committee shall be final and the decision of the Committee will not be challenged in any court of law.

4. Any other scholarship / awards / discounts may also be given to students by the management of the College.
